I am taking seven subjects: English, Maths, Chinese (second language), Biology, Chemistry, Philosophy and ToK. ToK stands for "Theory of Knowlegde" and we ask questions like "How do we know things?" and "How are we sure that we are right? Are we sure?"

lenders.name: Mark & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Tom Arbuckle brought  the idea of forming a kiva.org group to the Michigan Tech Alumni Association.  It's a great idea and the Board of Directors agreed wholeheartedly.  We like kiva.org because you can see where your loans are going.  These are great stories of deserving people who want to make better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: The Michigan Tech Alumni Association has over 52,000 members all over the world.  Many of these alumni work for a number of philanthropic causes.  I hope this kiva.org group will give our members the means to further fund good works across the world.

Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945) Thirty-second President of the USA

lenders.name: Drew Rowell
lenders.loan_because:
I firmly believe that small businesses are the key to building up an economy and helping a nation. 

Instead of just putting in more resources, which only helps people for a small amount of time, microlending stimulates (and increases) the transfer of resources by allowing small businesses to grow, which insures that those business owners the ability to spend in other places in the long run, which in turn gives others the ability to spend. 

It's a cycle, and I think that microlending is a great way to help the cycle get started.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a sophomore at a high school in Missouri, USA. I enjoy programming and writing. I live on a farm so I also like taking care of and spending time with animals.

You can read my blog at http://www.linuxdistroreview.com

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an organization that makes a difference.  There is so much poverty in the world and I think Kiva is a way to help.  People deserve the chance of a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an energy company reviewing contracts and buying insurance to protect the company from catastrophic risk.
